name: Tiki journey
description:
Join Tiki on his adventure!

- Five different levels. Overcome plains, desert, waterfall, ancient temple and high mountains.

- Collect 30 crystals in each level to achieve the best result.

- Four types of opponents and a boss battle.

- Nice musical accompaniment, unique for each level.

- Eat pineapples to restore health.

- Secrets are hidden in every level. Can you find them all?

- The game saves progress to your disk. If you delete the game, but then decide to return to it, you do not have to start over.

- You can see the controls in the main menu. You can also adjust the volume of the music there.
